long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
■ A Simple Timer for Focused Work
This extension displays a timer in the side panel, automatically starting a countdown once the time is set. No beeps or notifications will interrupt your focus. Even after the timer ends, you can keep it running if you're still concentrating.

■ Key Features
- Minimal Timer Display: Easily track time in the side panel.
- Automatic Countdown: Starts counting down as soon as you set the time.
- No Distractions: No sound or notifications when the timer ends.
- Stay Focused: Keep working even after the timer stops.

Perfect for those who want to stay focused without interruptions. Manage your time quietly and efficiently.
long.en,en_AU:
■ A simple timer for focused work
This extension displays a timer on the side panel and automatically starts a countdown  when the timer is open. By default, there is no beep to interrupt your concentration. Even after the timer ends, you can keep it running if you're still focused.

■ Key features
- Minimal timer display: Easily track time in the side panel.
- Automatic countdown: Starts counting down as soon as you set the time.
- No distractions: No sound or notifications when the timer ends by default.
- Stay focused: Keep working even after the timer stops.
- Create your own preset: Customize your preset with emoji and timer color.
- Customize: Beep / auto-restart is configurable.

Perfect for those who want to concentrate without interruptions. 
Manage your time quietly and efficiently.
